item.title: By: Steve Rydz
item.dc:creator: Steve Rydz
item.description: This is funny as I was thinking about using grid paper as a background to my site and then I realised just how common it actually was.
item.content:encoded: This is funny as I was thinking about using grid paper as a background to my site and then I realised just how common it actually was.
